entrada.comentario: Un libro muy bueno sobre bases de datos.

entrada.titulo: Advanced Programming in the Unix environment
entrada.comentario: Un libro claro y detallado de programación en UNIX.

entrada.titulo: TCP/IP Illustrated, Vol. 1: The Protocols (2nd Edition)
entrada.comentario: Uno de los mejores libros de TCP/IP
Comprehensive in scope, based on a working standard, and thoroughly illustrated, this book is an indispensable resource for anyone working with TCP/IP.
You’ll explore the concepts behind REST, learn different strategies for creating hypermedia-based APIs, and then put everything together with a step-by-step guide to designing a RESTful Web API.
